rows.label: qst502009_msg0002
rows.name:
I've seen all sorts of salvaged
goods, but this is a first...

rows.label: qst502009_msg0101
rows.name:
It might work if it's continuously
supplied with lightning power...

rows.label: qst502009_msg0102
rows.name:
But it would probably take someone
with overflowing lightning power who
can also control it perfectly...

rows.label: qst502009_msg0103
rows.name:
Oh, right. Try it at night. It's
too dangerous during the day
with so many people around.
